name: Color Splash: Dinosaurs
description:
Color Splash: Dinosaurs is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of cool dinosaurs and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful dinosaurs paintings.

You need to skillfully move puzzle pieces, find their corresponding places, and harmoniously connect the colored details. Paying great attention to detail and applying a creative approach will help you become a true master at assembling dinosaurs pictures.

Start gathering your collection of dinosaurs pictures right now!

In Color Splash: Dinosaurs:

•50 levels
•Colorful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music
